snippet.title: Sorry We're Closed - Official Demo Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into the world of Sorry We're Closed in this latest trailer for the upcoming single-player survival horror game. Check out the trailer for a breakdown of what you can expect, including the story setting, gameplay, exploration of the game's demon world, and more. Sorry We're Closed will be available on PC and a demo is available now on Steam.

In Sorry We're Closed, explore unsettling locations with fixed camera angles. Fight in first person with demonic weapons. Open your Third Eye to see between worlds, uncover secrets, and solve puzzles.
